title: Real History
description:
For what it is worth, I think we can all benefit from a multiplicity of ideas and information. One thing that can certainly be said for our MSM and school system is that it only conveys information which is deemed necessary. Truth takes a flier when the empire requires a docile mass to control. I put together a file that fits on a single DVD that contains hundreds of hours of lectures. The following list is just some of the contributors and topics. I hope everyone who is willing to take the time will check it out and see if anything contained strikes a chord. Some of this material has changed my life.
